hero.heading: High end courses, hands-on projects, and job-ready certificate programs

unicamp.caption: Why?
unicamp.title: Why Unicamp?
unicamp.description: We are a team of professionals who are passionate about teaching and helping others. We are here to help you succeed.

items.title: Gain hands-on experience
items.description: Work on projects that mirror real-world challenges, using tools the industry trusts.

items.title: Showcase your work live
items.description: Launch your project to real users and impress potential employers with tangible results. No other academy really delivers on that.

items.title: Boost your portfolio
items.description: Add real-world projects to your LinkedIn and get noticed by a wider audience.

items.title: Join a curious and driven community
items.description: Surround yourself with people who inspire growth and creativity.

items.title: Collaborate with developers and UX designers students
items.description: Work in cross functional teams with other developers and designers.

items.title: Growth your network
items.description: Connect with like-minded people who inspire, support and help you to grow both professionally and personally.

items.title: Dedicated mentor
items.description: A person to share both the triumphs and challenges with, offering guidance and support throughout your courses.

items.title: Career-focused advice
items.description: Discuss your goals, map out your future, and get insider tips on breaking into the IT industry.

team.heading: Unicamp team
team.description: We are a team of professionals who are passionate about teaching and helping others. We were in this industry for several years and decided to open our IT academy offering all the insights

programs.title: Unicamp programs
programs.description: Choose your course and kick off your best IT career.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.caption: 1 month
webDevelopment.description: Our web development program is designed to help you learn the skills you need to succeed as a web developer. We offer a variety of courses to help you learn the skills you need to succeed in the IT field.

productDesign.title: UX/UI Design
productDesign.caption: 1 month
productDesign.description: Our web development program is designed to help you learn the skills you need to succeed as a web developer. We offer a variety of courses to help you learn the skills you need to succeed in the IT field.
tools: AI Tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, DaVinchi AI)

contact.heading: Still have questions?
contact.description: Please describe your case to receive the most accurate advice

questions.question: Are the courses really free?
questions.answer: Yes, all our courses are 100% free. We believe that everyone should have access to quality education.
